issues: Coordinate discrepancy: 1.37 km difference between asserted coordinates and geocoded location
Elevation difference: 9.4m between asserted (405.4m) and geospatial lookup (396.0m)
env_local_scale term 'area of gramanoid or herbaceous vegetation' has typo ('gramanoid' should be 'graminoid')
Missing ecosystem and ecosystem_category fields that other samples in study have populated
geo_loc_name format could be more specific (lacks sub-region detail compared to NMDC schema recommendations)
recommendations: Verify and reconcile coordinate discrepancy - check if asserted coordinates (39.102192, -96.56118) or geocoded coordinates (39.1002012, -96.576798) are more accurate for the actual sampling location
Correct the spelling in env_local_scale from 'gramanoid' to 'graminoid' to match proper botanical terminology
Add ecosystem ('Environmental') and ecosystem_category ('Terrestrial') fields to match other samples in the study
Consider more specific geo_loc_name following NMDC format: 'USA: Kansas, Riley County, Konza Prairie Biological Station'
Validate elevation measurement against geospatial data (9.4m difference may be within acceptable range but should be verified)
Consider adding more environmental context fields like specific_ecosystem to better describe the prairie grassland environment
